review: Awesome device and great content on Amazon Prime
author: Richard Heffelfinger

review: some more apps or options would be nice
author: Chad A. Margo "margoat"

review: It was what we expected.  Very easy to set up.  It will be nice to see some of the recent movies at home.
author: MaryK

review: Even 3 stars is pushing it. Worse problem is that all the programs are very dark when using the Fire TV Stick.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Lots of good stuff. Very easy to set up. I have Amazon Prime so the Fire TV stick is great. Still, other devices have a greater variety.
author: Amazon Customer "retired geek"

review: Absolutely love it!  Can't believe how easy it was to install and the sound and movies/videos/TV shows are just amazing.  Picture on TV is amazing!!
author: Cathy Waltrip
